text: Which part exactly are you having trouble with?
I had trouble in the nav bar, because I need to put in the right part a button but my template don’t have , and I don’t now how to do it in code
You’ll probably want to create a header module that includes the necessary fields for your button. And then include that module in your header partial
Just make sure you set that module’s `"is_available_for_new_content"` equal to `false` so that it doesn’t show up in your drag and drop module list
